DOC.brief_summary: This is a clinical study to determine the safety and efficacy of an investigational drug in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: MK0431 Monotherapy Study in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (0431-040)
DOC.criteria: Patients have Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus and have laboratory results that are within the values established by the study such as an Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) >=7.5% and <=11% and a Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) >=130 mg/dL and <=280 mg/dL Exclusion Criteria : Patients have Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus or required insulin therapy within the past 12 months
